model: Possible models: Linear, EfficientNet, SPEfficientNet, SPEfficientNetv2
log: Log training progress via wandb if true, output to terminal if false
log_signal: Log all signals, activations, weights, gradients
debug: Debug mode, uses random data and other things you want to try
normalization: True to use batch normalization, false to not use batch normalization
activation: Activation function to use: Swish, HSwish, Sigmoid, HSigmoid, ReLU, SELU
signal_preserving: true to use the signal preserving activation function
